name: terribly
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

dsense.name: terribly
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

dsense.name: terribly
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

example.eg: I'm terribly pleased to hear that you've got a job.
example.egtrans: 听说你找到了工作，我高兴坏了。

example.eg: I was terribly sorry to hear about the death of your mother.
example.egtrans: 听到你母亲去世的消息，我非常难过。
